base.string: Hermes-1 é uma estação espacial de colonização colossal capaz de criar vida e desenvolver tecnologia, sendo considerada uma das criações mais notáveis ​​que a humanidade já criou.@paragraphVocê é um dos comandantes a bordo do Hermes-1, encarregado de uma missão crítica para colonizar um planeta e criar um novo capítulo na história da humanidade.@paragraphUse os recursos limitados da estação da maneira mais eficiente possível e implante navios de colonização menores para criar condições de sobrevivência ideais para o futuro da humanidade.

[b]ESMA-01[/b] é o primeiro planeta descobrido pela União dos Clones que possui uma vida sustentável. [b]ERAN-02[/b] é um planeta vermelho rico em minerais e alguns outros compostos. Durante a fase inicial de planejamento, foi decidido que uma grande base militar e instalações de mineração em todo o planeta seriam construídos. [b]SAHRON-03[/b] é um planeta tropical de grande valor estratégico, onde a União dos Clones e Império Ark o designam para colonização. Quem será o primeiro? [b]ALDON-04[/b] é um dos últimos planetas descobertos pela União dos Clones. Com base em relatórios preliminares, este planeta é capaz de sustentar a vida humana, mas o clima severo e imprevisível torna-o difícil. Desanexar Patch notes are unavailable for this game build. Ragnorium é um jogo em Acesso Antecipado que ainda está sendo desenvolvido, o que significa que ele irá evoluir enquanto você o joga. Por isso você pode encontrar erros, travamentos, recursos inacabados e falta de conteúdo ao longo do jogo. Por favor, seja paciente e apoie seu desenvolvimento fazendo parte de nossa comunidade. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental. Calor Extremo SUJEIRA Pasta Não é possível construir perto deste local FPS Modo Janela em Tela Cheia Jogadores Placar Luz Cromática Tremor da Tela Episódio Episódio 1: Hammerhead Pass Garnworm Ovo de Garnworm GEN2 Navio de Colonizaçãos GEN3 Navio de Colonizaçãos Geral Espaço Quantidade ALPHA BETA DELTA GAMMA TAU ZETA Remova a zona previamente colocada do solo Crescimento Ovos de Gull A vida e a morte são produtos do acaso, do tempo e de fatores inexplicáveis. Houve um evento que dizimou a população. Era inevitável por padrão. Ragnorium, como foi definido, criou um novo mundo que daria vida a duas facções principais. A União dos Clones é uma aliança de corporações, comunidades científicas, clones e outros grupos menores. O Império Ark é uma coalizão de comunidades religiosas significativas. Estas facções tentaram manter a paz, apesar de terem ideologias e métodos drasticamente diferentes. A paz não durou, e agora, o velho mundo está voltando... Eles estão vindo... NOTAS DE CORREÇÃO ACESSO ANTECIPADO Comandante A Diretriz de Pesquisa é um protocolo utilizado para premiar colônias fiéis com tecnologias que seguem a narrativa da União dos Clones nos esforços de colonização. Devido ao conflito contra o Império Ark e a imprevisibilidade do DNA clonado, foi considerado extremamente inseguro enviar grandes quantidades de dados para as colônias remotas. A superioridade tecnológica da União dos Clones será usada contra a sua própria colônia se você for desonesto. Próximo Nível de Desbloqueio @value to complete this Pesquisa Objective. Atacar em Grupo Visão Geral da Produção Menu PESQUISAR PÁGINAS Ragnorium is more than just a game - it is my odyssey, a long journey in the making. I am not particularly skilled, but I have time and grit to see this journey to the end. This page should serve as a memorial of the vital milestones that Ragnorium attained. I hope that you find value in this, and get inspiration to start your own development odyssey; it can be anything. There are no bounds to creativity. Blueprints Career Colônia Notícias Ideias Episódios CENTRO DE NOTIFICAÇÃO Corrente Objetiva Concluído Commander, our Colony is evolving rapidly and we have to consider adopting new construction tech in order to keep up. Our scouts have detected multiple Adamantium deposits and it would be beneficial to investigate the site for any resources. Adamantium There is a new threat in the form of Alien Capsules. These capsules are designed to exterminate life, and if not destroyed, could reduce our chances of survival. Our data indicate that some actors already possess these capsules, and we want you to deal with them. Alien Capsule Commander! We detected a few Ark Clone pods nearby and preliminary reports indicate that there is an Ark Patrol movement. You must raid their location while they are still unprepared with everything you have. Ark Scouts Commander! Our Scouts detected an Ark Intel package that we believe could be a game-changer if we can acquire one for ourselves. Consider an assault if you think you can take them on. Assault - Ark Intel Commander! We have detected a small Ark scout ship, and we believe a small Ark Scout party has mobilized there to scavenge the wreckage for resources. Attack them before the re-join the main force! Assault - Ark Wreck Commander! A small Ark force has taken a temporary break at the Ark Pylon that our Scouts found a while ago. I advise we launch a surprise attack at night and reduce their numbers. [b]If you attack at night, you will deal 50% more damage.[/b] Assault - Ark Pylon Commander, it would not hurt if we could dedicate some of our efforts in crafting a few bandages in case we get attacked by enemies. Bandages Commander! We have detected not so long ago a location that could yield some extra resources. Consider sending a scavenging party. Empty Barrels Commander! We have a request for you. We encountered a boar a while ago and we believe it would be beneficial if we could slaughter one for sustenance. It would be horrible if we ran out of food. Boar Hunt Commander! We have detected an emergency bunker that has been most likely built by the previous commander, and we believe somebody is living there. We should investigate and find out if colonists that live there want to join our colony. Fallout Bunker #1 It seems that someone from the bunker is willing to join our Colony, but only if we help the people. Commander, deliver six foliage bandages to the Fallout Bunker. Helping Bunker #1 Yet another Bunker has been discovered, and we want you to take an investigation party there. It will be beneficial that if you make contact with the colonists that live there and convince them to join our colony. Fallout Bunker #2 We discovered yet another location with a bunker, and we want you to take a party there. Convince anyone who lives there to join our Colony. Fallout Bunker #3 Garnworms are nasty and it would be a good idea to bury them to keep our Colony free from corpses. Burial of Worm Commander! There is a caravan not so far away from our colony, and we believe it's worth investigating the location. Maybe we will find something useful for our colony - but stay vigilant as there may be hostiles nearby. Caravan Showdown Commander, we have detected a statue close to our colony. We were hoping you could send an investigation party to check it out? Carrot Stash Many believe that it would be a good idea to celebrate Christmas in-between our busy schedules. We have taken an effort to locate a location that could be used for this purpose. Christmas Spirit We came in hot! It's time to scavenge all possible resources from the wreck. You never know if these resources will come in handy, Commander. Clone Pod Debris Commander, I believe it would be wise to create some cloth for our Colony which we could later use to create clothes for our Colonists... Cloth Bolts We have to ramp up our efforts in building a foundation for our colony. Commander, start building [b]bases[/b] as we will need to provide more housing in the future. Construction Initiative Commander, we located an interesting structure that could be salvaged for scrap. Consider sending scavenging party and get those resources for the utilization. Be careful. It's infested with scorpids. Church of Metal Commander, I have a request for you. Humans throughout the ages were coexisting and exploiting critters for resources. I believe our colony won't be an exception either. I want you to visit this location and discover the blueprint for the critter crafting table. Critter Homes Commander! I have located an automated distribution facility that is a part of the CUDS network. I advise you to take measures to liberate the facility so that we can utilize CUDS to the fullest. Distribution Facility Commander, I have detected an anomaly. It appears that the natives of this planet are using garden lamps as equipment. We could learn a thing or two from their craft - why don't we acquire their items? Date Commander! Everyone is starting to get really worried about being constantly attacked and thus we recommend you start building up defensive spikes around your colony. [b]Construct Spikes[/b] Fence Build-up Commander! We have detected an old abandoned vehicle not so far away from our colony, and our scouts report that there might be some useful items out there. Defibrillator Commander, I would like to have apple pie for my next meal. Diet — Apple Pie Commander, fulfill my need. I would like to have a banana smoothie. Diet — Banana Smoothie Commander, I would like to have mashed potatoes. Diet — Mashed Potatoes Commander, we have detected an unguarded structure that could have some cooking resources that we need. Consider assembling a raiding party. Ataque Grande Não estamos sozinhos neste planeta alienígena. É hora de proteger nossa nova colônia dos pequenos Garnworms que vagam por essas terras. Primeira Luta Temos sorte de que este planeta tenha árvores. Nós os usaremos para construir nossos primeiros edifícios - hora de colher árvores para obter recursos. Primeiro Corte Comandante! Localizamos uma cabana de pescador não muito longe de nossa colônia. Acreditamos que a localização pode nos render alguns dados úteis sobre como pescar adequadamente. Fantasia da Pescaria Comandante! Para acender uma fogueira nós precisamos encontrar uma pederneira. Vamos começar a olhar ao redor e ver se podemos encontrar algum. Sobrevivência - Sílex Olhos verdes desesperados podem ser vistos à distância. Eles pertencem a uma máquina que está em grande desespero. Devemos investigar a máquina e ver o que está acontecendo. Andarilho Amigável Commander! Go to these coordinates and discover an old outpost that, based on my data, should have a gas mask that you can use as a base to create multiple masks. Blueprint — Gas Mask Commander, these happy pills will help your Colonists to stay happy. I hope that this stash will come in handy. Happy Pills I want a Hat. I want to be classy. Just a Hat Commander! We have a request for you. We want to form a hunting party and hunt for an Ibex as we believe it will be of good use for our Colony. [b]Make sure to have weapons.[/b] Red Ibex Hunt I am fresh from the pod, and I want to take a short lazy walk to check my new surroundings. Idle Walk For some time now our Colonists have been reporting that some weird looking humanoid alien things are watching our colony at night. Today we learned that they are preparing a small attack on our Colony. Time to defend ourselves. Few Unfriendly Scavs - Império Ark Acolyte - Império Ark Acolyte We have disturbed the local ecosphere and certain primitive lifeforms are starting to form an organized strike force. Deal with them Commander. Right To Exist Defeat of the scouting scav party really upset these mysterious entities and now they are sending a larger unit to scavenge our colony. From the very start we knew that these humanoid creatures would be a big problem for our existence. Deal with them Commander! Scavs It appears that our Colony is on a pathway of a scorpid migration wave. We need to protect our colony as it seems that these creatures will devour everything in their path. Scorpid Migration Minor faction known to us as Stonehorn are starting to view us as threat and from the looks of their actions they want to exterminate our colony. Commander, we have to defend our colony from these invaders. Protect our home! Stonehorn Invasion Commander, Stonehorns are starting to pressure our Colony even further and they have decided to launch yet another attack on our Colony. Prepare yourself! Stonehorn Pressure Commander! We believe that by leveraging the Inverted Multiverse machine, we could harness the multiverse power and experience a phenomenon called an event. Two events would appear daily as long as one of your colonists is carrying that machine. Inversion Machine Commander! There is a strange smell coming from the outskirts of our colony and it's upsetting our colonists. We want to know where this smell is coming from and if something can be done about it. That Smell I am on a new planet, and I feel excitement flowing through my body! I need to share this information with my new friends. First Conversation King Ramek is one of the Stonehorn leaders. His rocket has just landed and we may have a chance to eliminate him. Commander, I suggest you assemble a party and deal with him before he leaves. King Ramek Commander, according to recent reports, there is a location nearby that contains caged critters. Caged critters should be rescued so they can become part of our colony. Lost and Forgotten Commander, based on our reports there is a location near us that contains caged critters. Maybe geese? Lost and Forgotten 2 We have detected some lost cargo from earlier times. Consider scouting the location for some resources that our colony could use. Lost Carga We discovered an abandoned lumber mill from the old times. It would be beneficial to investigate how it was made so that we can make one for ourselves. Blueprint — Lumber Mill The tower in the distance appears to be the origin of our species. Commander, we should scout the area for potential clues and find information on what has happened. Tower of Rust A multiverse machine can suppress events that occur between the day and evening transition cycle. Consider obtaining this machine as soon as possible, but be advised that this machine is highly guarded. Obtain Multiverse Machine I would like to have a room for myself. It's starting to become wearisome to sleep wherever I can. Please fulfill my wish, Commander. My Room Commander! Império Ark is planning an attack, and surviving this crusade will require some special preparations. The first thing that we need to do is to gather the necessary components to complete a bodge bomb. Blueprint — Bodge Bomb Commander! We detected an unusually old tree within the proximity of our colony's outskirts, and we believe it would be beneficial to investigate this. We hope that we can uncover some new details about the planet... Old Árvore Back on Earth I used to wear pants. How about you make me new ones? Thank you! About those Pants I want a wooden Pendant. It will empower me. Wooden Pendant I had a previous life before arriving on this planet, and I want to share my story with someone when I am not working. Previous Life We discovered something very unusual in the distance, an old relic that resembles a holy cross. We need to investigate it and find out how it appeared here. What happened on this planet is a mystery. Preyer of the Past We have detected an interesting tower-like object further up ahead and we would like you, Commander, to dedicate an investigation party to uncover the secrets of that tower. Mysterious Pylon Send your strongest colonist on a repeatable objective and find medical supplies. Medical Supplies Send your strongest colonist on a repeatable objective and find water . Water Supplies Commander, the time has come. Colonists are now demanding their rooms. Could you sort this out before it gets ugly? Assign rooms for the colonists during this objective. Personal Room Commander, there is a small object glowing nearby. Why not investigate and pick it up for later use? Glowing Ruby Crystal Commander! We have discovered a scrap yard site. Send a team and see what you can find out there. Scrap Yard It's time to gear up. Someone has to make a new shirt for me. Thanks in advance, Commander! My first Shirt You know I was hoping that someone could make me a pair of shoes that I could use. If you think they can be made, then sort this out. Thanks! Shoes! Comandante, descobrimos um santuário próximo que arde com fogo eterno! Devemos investigar suas origens. Santuário de Fogo Commander! To make our Colonists stronger, we need to scavenge for resources. [b]One of the resources that can make colonists stronger is called "Capsula de Habilidade."[/b] which has become a standard through the União dos Clones. Capsula de Habilidade LV.1 Commander! More Skill Capsules have been discovered. It is advised to send colonists and recover resources to make your colonists stronger. Capsula de Habilidade LV.2 Commander! Skill Capsules have been detected in the vicinity. Expect resistance when sending colonists to scavenge. Capsula de Habilidade LV.3 Commander! Skill Capsules give unimaginable advantage to the individual colonists. I discovered more capsules for you to scavenge! Capsula de Habilidade LV.4 Skill Capsules have been discovered nearby! Send the scavenging team and recover them. Capsula de Habilidade LV.5 Commander! We discovered a Clone Pod not so far away from our colony, and we believe there is a clone that could be rescued and recruited. Why don't you send a rescue party and do something useful? Dormindo Beauty Some other commanders tried to colonize this planet but with zero success. There is a clone pod within proximity which contains a pristine clone. Consider sending a rescue party, Commander! Dormindo Beauty Comandante! A maneira mais eficiente de armar nossos colonos durante a fase inicial de nossa colônia agora seria fazer alguns gravetos da madeira. Gravetos de Guerra Fogueiras e outras construções rápidas estão se tornando rapidamente obsoletas. Acredito que seria uma ótima ideia considerar a construção de fornos de pedra em torno de sua base. Em particular, você pode colocar um estrategicamente dentro da casa para gerar calor para os colonos dentro da casa. Sobrevivência - Fornalha de Pedra Comandante! Detectamos uma estranha formação de pedra nas proximidades. Você investigaria este site com seus colonos? Golem de Pedra Comandante! Está pronto para um desafio? Há uma forte força inimiga perto de nós que deve ser tratada rapidamente antes que cresçam em número. Guerra de Pedras Comandante! Eu localizei um esconderijo militar escondido de granadas de atordoamento. Acredito que essas granadas seriam benéficas para o sucesso de nossa colônia. Além de granadas de atordoamento, meu scanner também localizou uma IA independente. Tome cuidado! Granadas de Efeito Comandante! Descubra quem está controlando os desonestos colonos sumérios e derrote seu mestre! Este objetivo consiste em quatro partes. Guerras Sumérias A particular individual classified as Time Traveler-89 has obtained large quantities of Time Capsules at some point in human history. This individual is considered to be a terrorist as he has altered history many times throughout our existence. Time Traveller's Log #1 We detected another datapad, and we are sure that events on this planet are somewhat linked to Time Traveler-89. Obtaining intel from the datapad will give us more insight into what happened here and what Time Traveler-89 is doing. Time Traveller's Log #2 Commander, the datapads that Time Traveller-89 left are part of the journey that he wants to share with everyone else. These messages serve as a historical record of what he has done but also give us clues on how to catch him. Send a party and obtain new intel! Time Traveller's Log #3 Commander, considering the recent sightings of Crap Golems, we should look for some tools that could help us deal with them. There is a ruined compound nearby that is believed to contain a toilet brush. Toilet Blues There is a trash site not so far away from our colony that is starting to accumulate unwelcome vermins. Please deal with them before they start growing in numbers. Vermin Problem Commander, there is a trashed scrap yard that was used for electronics. We should investigate the site and see if there's anything useful! Eletrônicos Destruídos Comandante, com um pouco de madeira, é possível fazer uma fogueira. Complete uma fogueira para que seus colonos possam se reunir ao redor dela quando estiver frio. Sobrevivência - Fogueira Comandante, precisamos decidir como queremos a aparência de nossa colônia e, portanto, seria benéfico se alguns de seus colonos explorassem um canteiro de obras abandonado. Sobrevivência - Mesa de Carpinteiro Comandante, precisamos construir uma Mesa de Cozinha para que possamos criar pratos que atendam aos pedidos de dieta dos nossos Colonos. Sobrevivência - Mesa de Cozinha Commander, we need to plan ahead and thus it would be beneficial to construct a Crafting table so that we can create tools and other items down the road. Sobrevivência - Mesa de Artesanato Commander! It would be beneficial to invest some time in studying what kind of flora this planet has to offer so that we can prepare some entry-level medicine. Sobrevivência - Homeopatia Comandante, para começar, precisamos criar itens para nossa colônia. Precisamos criar uma mesa de artesanato muito grosseira para fazer algumas das coisas básicas. Sobrevivência - Artesanato Primitivo Comandante, precisamos construir uma Tabela de Pesquisa para que possamos acelerar a taxa de geração de Pesquisa XP. Sobrevivência - Mesa de Pesquisa Comandante! Não quero dar muita importância a isso, mas quando você tiver um momento, gostaria de ter minha própria roupa íntima feita de pano. Roupa de Baixo Comandante! Há um antigo prédio de armazenamento abandonado de uma casa de fazenda que vale a pena investigar. Talvez você encontre alguns itens agrícolas úteis? Sementes de Trigo Comandante, alguns de nossos colonos ocasionalmente podem ouvir sinos encantadores e relaxantes. Vamos investigar de onde vem esse som. Espanta Espíritos Comandante, para começar nossa jornada, temos que estocar madeira, pois nossa colônia nos estágios iniciais será construída com este recurso primário. Acumulador de Madeira Comandante, Oficina nos permitirá transformar ferramentas e processos de sucata em outros materiais. Devemos fazer um Workshop o mais rápido possível, pois isso dará à nossa Colônia uma vantagem clara. Henry Williams reveals huge plans to reform the União dos Clones constitution in an attempt to give much needed democratic freedom following on from unrest in the minor groups of the Union. Statistical reports indicate an 86% increase in colony survival chance with the presence of a nearby deep-space União dos Clones Distribution Stations. The occurrence of the Império Ark crusades still the biggest threat factor variable. Propulsor speed improvements have been consistently rising by a 5-10% mark every year. Huge profit margins and low worker pay cause friction in delivery capacity estimations says source close to the management. Black market time travel capsules become the most desired products as they can alter history and benefit those with malicious intent. Officials warn that those who are involved in black market activities will be sentenced to death. Everyone on the Asteroid Resort CERES_5434_1FF dies as Ark Tetra Mothership slings past the asteroid during Quant Travel. Ark Bishops share their condolences but remind everyone that everything that happens in life is part of God's plans. Historians believe that the Ragnorium particle was developed with the help of the technology that came from the future. Ragnorium particle is subject to intensive research by both Império Ark and União dos Clones. Obtaining a license to operate and deal with Ragnorium particles in União dos Clones is a complicated process as it requires specific permits and training. Those that can't comply with official channels use the black market to get their share. After Ragnorium, everything changed in the known universe. To this date, it is regarded as the most significant event in known history as it puts nearly every known theory to man about our world into question. The great prophecy says that the Ark Bishops don't age and that they cannot die due to natural causes as God has blessed them with incredible powers. Heretic of ALDON-4 is considered to be a curse word amongst Ark citizens as they believe that those that use those words will end up banished to ALDON-4 at some point in their life. Time Traveller-89 is always one step ahead, as both the Império Ark and the União dos Clones struggle to keep up with the time terrorist. Only specific individuals in the União dos Clones at any given time can have multiple active copies of themselves. Colonization Clones are not considered to be a citizen of the União dos Clones. Instead they are regarded as property and thus those rules do not apply to them. Ark Peasants are the backbone of the Ark Crusade as they farm and provide rations that can be used by the military. Cyborg Puppies are half puppies and half cyborgs. União dos Clones created them as hybrids to satisfy a public need for loyal companions and to wage indirect, deceptive warfare against enemies. When the Império Ark fled this planet after the puppy invasion, certain terrorist groups started to occupy abandoned locations. Rumors are spreading that the third Acolyte is not a human but rather an android that was stolen from the União dos Clones and reprogrammed to purge clones. Sons of Anubis are a small terrorist group that consists of Ark heretics and clones. Their purpose is unknown, but they are highly interested in historical artifacts. Pixel Piracy is a game that gave me an identity and a lifelong mission to create something unique and life-changing. Ragnorium is a product of the countless failures and personal struggles of one man. Without Pixel Piracy’s legend, there would be no Ragnorium. I meet different players and sometimes players go above and beyond to help me. It's possible that when you read this message, those players will have moved on, and all that will remain is this memory and a monument. ESMA-1 Capitol Mayor issues an emergency order to evacuate the population into the bunkers as the hijacked cruiser AEGIR-1 approaches the planet. Tetra Uplink adopts a new encryption standard, which renders quantum computer decryptions impossible. Pesquisa Directive the first to adopt this new tech. ERAN-2 Mining operations go haywire as military experiments on the planet cause bio-catastrophe. União dos Clones officials recall all military personal from the planet in the wake of the events. Hidden Ark Heretic base has been located in the ALDON-4 mountains by the Ark scouts. Indecision by the Ark Bishops makes ALDON heretic clean-up crusade difficult. President of União dos Clones Henry William becomes the first person to utilize CEREB-Network to run multiple simultaneous copies of himself with a single conscious running on a supercomputer. Sources reveal that the Ark Protoblade is based on the stolen technology that has been used in the União dos Clones space travel technology. In response, the Pesquisa Directive is adopted by the União dos Clones. Offworld raiders have been pillaging and raiding mineral depots on the ERAN-2 for the last decade. Weaponized lifeforms have been deployed to deal with the raiders but with little success. Hammerhead is one of the Stonehorn leaders dispatched to this sector to construct a permanent fortification for the Stonehorn clan. Não Sim Recursos insuficientes Não é possível remover este objeto agora Transmissão de Entrada Transmissão Ativa Whoa, Commander! You are cocky with this one, aren't you? Kill them all and deliver a clear message that we will be fighting till the last member! Now look who we have here! Isn't that a Clone Commander? Your clones are nothing more than a speck of dirt and a plague that needs to be cleansed. I should have introduced myself first. I am Hayden, and I am one of the Acolytes that serve the Império Ark. With the blessing of our gods and guidance of our masters, I am here to purge this land. The wrath of God's hammer will exterminate the lab-grown abominations that spread illness throughout the land. Prepare yourself Clone Commander, you will not go further! Clone Commander, I see your actions have wounded acolyte Hayden. How can you defy the God who has created the known universe? Accept the fate of your people and be gone. Hayden is a good man, but he had no real combat experience of dealing with clones pumped full of steroids and hormones. Unlike Hayden, during my crusades I have killed plenty of clones in God's name, and this outting won't be any different. There is no denying that you have some skill, but you have to realize the facts that the so-called Pesquisa Directive of yours puts your people at a significant disadvantage when it comes to warfare. You can't defeat me with your sticks! This will end one way only, Commander. You and your people will perish within 24 hours. Commander! This attack is pure insanity at this stage; it's unreal that they managed to locate our colony so fast. Your colony doesn't have the required technology to fight Império Ark. If only we had more time to develop our Colony to suit the União dos Clones's vision; we could have unlocked more potent technologies. Commander, despite this, I believe there is a possibility to survive the assault. We need to use our strength, Commander. We are clones, and clones can be very versatile in such situations. We are going to strike them first through guerrilla tactics. They won't expect this. I am going to add a new shared colonist objective to your list called "Bodge Bomb". We could craft this bomb very quickly with the available resources, but the issue is that one of your Colonists would act as a trigger. Commander, it's up to you how you want to perform here! Commander, as painful as it sounds, it is something that has to be done or our Colony will be eradicated by the Império Ark. Just make sure that the bomb is constructed somewhere where the enemy will pass! Commander! You can't see or smell it, but my sensors pick up high amounts of holy particles within the area. This is super bad and we have to act quickly! I have added a new objective to your list. I believe our only chance of surviving this attack is to construct gas masks for our colonists. There is an old outpost that contains a standard-issue gas mask that can be used as a base to generate masks for the colonists. When you complete the objective and have produced masks by your tailor, you will have to defend your colony from attack; however, if you want, you can also launch an offensive by yourself. The clock is ticking Commander! Oh, look, it's a Clone Commander! We had a Commander of our own a few hundred years ago, but now we are pretty much on our own. Some of us would probably join your colony, but we are not yet ready to commit to your cause. When our Commander died, our ancestors lost all support from the União dos Clones and we were left on our own to survive. We have never forgotten this. Why don't you come over here and we can assess the situation? You are just an expendable Clone Commander like our old Commander was, and so I want to believe in you and your cause. I noticed that you have not built a campfire yet. Your Colonists are freezing! I highly recommend that you build a campfire as soon as possible! Commander, I see that you decided to cancel an objective that you committed to earlier. Colonists from your Colony were looking forward to completing that. Keep in mind that [b]when you cancel objectives, your Colonists lose an immense amount of happiness[/b]. You are in luck! I have some Chrono Boost for you to experiment with. In case you did not know you can manage time with the Time Capsules that are used in a Chrono Boost. I care for you, and I want you and your race to succeed in this mission. We will get through this, Commander... I guarantee this with a 12.3456% probability. Commander, do you like stories? Well, have I got a story for you! I have some information about Ragnorium and Crap Golems. Shortly after Ragnorium occurred, we started experiencing strange phenomenon that completely shattered the known universe's rules. Certain bacteria started rapidly evolving and binding to the host matter. As a result, they would inherit the traits of their former hosts. All living beings produce waste. After a certain amount of time, this waste grows and becomes a fully functional organism. As a result, you can occasionally see peculiar creatures take form—for example, the Crap Golems. Crap Golems are not dangerous alone, but if they start growing and producing their own waste, they will evolve to the point where we will not be able to defeat such monsters. There is more to it, Commander, but further data access is restricted. Commander! You can now access the Contracts Tab within the CUDS menu. Completing Delivery Contracts will not only help you but other Commanders also well as it is a shared network. Just continue working towards our common goal and União dos Clones will succeed. Commander! You defeated an Ark Acolyte! What you did is impressive, given how undeveloped our colony is. However, I am not entirely sure what that just was. Did you really get him? As happy as you are, Império Ark is going to be infuriated with what has happened here. I suspect their survey ship will be returning with a stronger force at some point soon. Don't let your guard down! Acolyte Smith has been defeated. You are exceptional Commander, and rest assured that I will transmit the combat data to the União dos Clones so that we have a better chance of survival in the future. Two defeated Acolytes and one more to go, Commander. These Acolytes have been problematic from the start and it is refreshing to process combat data with a positive outcome. Commander, now that the Ark Threat is eliminated, we want you to continue your mission. If something comes up, I'll let you know. Good luck! Commander! You have reached the end of the line, and what that means is that the technology that you need is not available to you through Pesquisa Directive right now. It could take some time before this technology arrives, so I suggest you continue your recolonization mission. [b]I have also taken an effort to populate your objective list with some objectives[/b] that I think are worth completing if you want to improve your odds. These objectives are challenging, but if you manage to clear them out, you will be rewarded for your effort. Commander, good luck! What the bunker overseer has just told you is accurate, and there is no denying that. It's not even a secret that everyone is expendable in our society, you see this is how humanity has evolved within the União dos Clones. Everything started to change in small incremental steps and at some point, it became normal. Commander, there is something I need to tell you that concerns your Colony. The technology that has brought you to this planet is by current standards [b] obsolete[/b], and there are now far more efficient ways to transport cargo and living mass to the planet. There were multiple commanders besides you who were assigned to colonize this planet. One of them even managed to build a sustainable colony, but external forces annihilated everything. Commander, Mission Control has high hopes for your mission, and they will try to help you as much as possible as long as you stay committed. Right now I am pretty blind, so I can't provide you real-time support, but I hope that [b]Radar[/b] of yours is coming along. Commander! Did you know that there are multiverse events? These events are controlled by a mysterious actor who appeared after Ragnorium. For some time now, we have been suppressing multiverse events for you with the multiverse machine. But now, we want you to have an opportunity to activate these events if you feel like it. I have updated your objective list with a new Inversion Machine Objective. When carried by colonists, events will start to appear two times a day for your colony. Hey! It appears that your Colonists have to travel long distances to reach their destinations. Keep your focus around your colony for now. While you are free to do what you want, your colonists are vulnerable to enemy attacks, and this can result in their death if they are not within the boundaries of your colonies protection. You have just experienced an event which we believe was orchestrated by a mysterious actor that controls the multiverse technology. Events come in many shapes and began to appear shortly after Ragnorium and the formation of the Império Ark. We are not sure who exactly operates the multiverse events. Still, we have a way to suppress this occurrence, as we believe they are harmful to our colony's development. I populated your objective list with a new objective (Obtain Multiverse Machine). You will be able to suppress one occurrence of an event each day as long as one of your colonists carries that machine. This machine is a true marvel developed by União dos Clones. Commander, it appears that your colony does not have any storage space to store items. Your colony requires storage space to function correctly. To build storage space, either create a resource zone or a dedicated item container from the [b]construction menu[/b]. Well, that was a fascinating insight. From the data I managed to snag, it was a transmission from the past. Vejo que você chegou a este planeta inteiro. Você fez uma viagem agradável? Não consigo imaginar como a distância era imensurável em termos humanos. Comandante, parece que você optou por não participar do briefing, o que, para mim, parece ser a escolha certa devido à sua formação em marketing Seu objetivo é estabelecer uma colônia autossustentável neste planeta remoto com os recursos e tecnologias disponíveis. Boa sorte, Comandante, vai precisar! You acquired the infamous time capsule. These are dangerous but very useful items as they allow you to control time. You can either speed up the time on the planet or copy your colonists. It's pretty useful technology but it has its own implications... Commander! I see that you have not discovered Flint yet. [b] Flint is required if you want to start a campfire and produce heat[/b] so that your colonists don't freeze into ice cubicles. In case you did not have Campfire yet, head to the Construction menu and select Heat Category from the category selection tab strip. Okay, now that you know where you can construct a campfire, we need to dispatch colonists on an objective and discover flint. Open Pesquisa Directive Menu and select [b]Survival — Flint[/b] Objective. After completing the objective, [b]remember to collect flint fragments[/b] near the silo. Your colonists don't know how to mine yet, but those fragments will do just fine for the time being. Commander, [b]you now have access to the defense objects[/b], which can give your colony much needed protection. Defense objects yield Defense Rating, which is automatically converted into skill capsules when you reach a certain threshold of Defense. This rating system works in the same way as the prestige rating system. Commander, once this objective is complete, we can create a fishing rod that can be used to catch fish and other objects from the water. To create a fishing rod, you will need to use a crafting table. You now have access to the prestige system, which allows you to receive skill capsule rewards by construction decoratives. Decorative objects yield Prestige, which is automatically converted into skill capsules when you reach a certain threshold of the Prestige. [b]Unused Skill Capsules can be converted into Expansion Capsules at the Colonist Profile -> Skill Grid to expand your construction area.[/b] Note: [b]Skill Capsules can be used within the Colonist profile menu to make your colonists stronger.[/b] Commander, it appears that you have a skill capsule available. You can use it to improve your colonists. Let's quickly go through the process of improving colonists. First, select a colonist that we want to improve. Just [b]open up a profile view of one of your colonists[/b]. The skill grid contains slots that can be occupied by skill capsules. These capsules come in an array of flavors. As your colonists level up, additional slots can be unlocked and stocked with more skill capsules. You can click empty Skill Grid slots and assign newly acquired skill capsules. Keep in mind that [b]assigning skill capsules to the colonist grid is a permanent procedure[/b], so carefully plan how you want to build your colonists. Commander, [b]you now have access to the threat rating[/b], which is used to indicate your colony's threat level. When you reach threat Milestones, your colony will be attacked by Aliens. Unlike Prestige and Defense rating, the Threat rating is unavoidable, and you get one point of threat every time a cycle or an event appears. Take a look at the top left UI corner for more info. Note that the Aliens are human-made creatures that inherit human DNA and are infused with Ragnorium particles. The communication line has been established, Commander. My data is indicating that we need to run diagnostics and an onboarding program. How do you feel after such a long journey to this planet? Construction menu is [b]divided into the categories[/b]. What we need is select [b]Zonas category[/b]. [b]Click the Zone Category [/b]and [b]then click the Resource Zone button[/b]. Try [b]clicking on the terrain[/b] where you want this resource zone to exist. A [b]central reachable location[/b] is preferred, but it's up to you. [b]Keep in mind that Resource Zone can store up to 9 different items, so if you run out of storage space, you can always expand the Resource Zone[/b] or start building actual storage containers if you have that tech available. Good thinking with that one. The [b]top left corner indicates what resources[/b] your Colony has, [b]You can cycle resource categories from there as well if you need to find specific an item[/b]. Commander, I'll let this information sink in for a while. I will call you back in a moment. In the meantime, this is a [b]good chance for your Colonists to gather some wood[/b]... While you were traveling to this planet, a lot of things happened. But before we can dwell on that, I am going to initiate a tutorial sequence. Are you ready, Commander? To start, you should try and move your Camera in all four different directions using [b]W[/b],[b]A[/b],[b]S[/b], and [b]D[/b] keys. How about rotating your camera now using [b]Q[/b] and [b]E[/b] keys? You have to [b]wake up[/b] those sleeping colonists next. What you need to do is [b]locate them[/b] first. [b]Press that glowing button[/b] in case you haven't found them yet after that rough landing. The way you [b]wake up[/b] your colonists is simply by [b]right-clicking[/b] them and selecting [b]Instant Actions / Wake Up[/b] option when they are sleeping. By hovering over the colonist, UI will also show you additional options that you can do. Be aware that your [b]Colonists[/b] are [b]automated[/b] workers, meaning that you don't need to interact with them directly beyond Context Menu. However, if the situation arises, you can select them and command them where you want them to move. Let's test [b]how this automation works[/b] in action next! Time to [b]collect[/b] some natural resources next Commander. Let's locate a harvestable [b]tree[/b]. This is a [b]Context Menu[/b]. Nearly all interactions happen through [b]Context Menu[/b]. Select an option that makes sense for the given situation. [b]We need to harvest this tree[/b] Colonists that are not busy [b]will eventually work on a task[/b] that you selected through Context Menu. This task will produce a resource called [b]wood[/b], which [b]can be used in many productions[/b]. To utilize resources, we need to designate a zone or create a container where it will be stored. What you should do next is [b]choose an area[/b] where Colonists will carry resources. In an ideal scenario, [b]we would have a warehouse full of containers...[/b]. Let's [b]open the Construction menu[/b] and purchase [b]Building Area Plot[/b] using Expansion Capsules. After you have done that, you can assign [b]Resource Zone[/b] from the Zonas Category. I am resuming the briefing, Commander. Now that you know the basics of how resource gathering works, [b]we will start planning how we will utilize them[/b]. It's time to [b]open the Construction Menu[/b] once again, Commander. The Construction Menu has many different categories, and as you progress further, more of these categories will be unlocked. Let's select a [b]Base[/b]; it will be used as a foundation for our first house. Now place a base construction somewhere on a stable surface within the bounds of your Computador Quântico where you want your house to be. [b]Size of 2 X 2 should work.[/b]. A House, by definition, is something that has at least one entrance to the enclosed space with a roof! A Designed House is now going to be built by your colonists throughout your mission based on available resources and colonists' workload priorities. To start building an entrance, we need to add a ramp next to the foundation. Finally, we finish our house by adding a roof above our base foundation. Next, we need to place walls and a door frame. Your house needs eight walls and one door frame connected to the ramp. Commander, we are now at the point where I have to tell you [b]something[/b]. Did you ever wonder why you had to build this primitive wooden house and why your colonists are naked? This particular mission [b]was a huge risk[/b]. To be precise, Mission Command could not [b]risk sending technology[/b] on small navio de colonizaçãos as the Império Ark could intercept you and your crew. We are descendants of the old world, and we share the same flaws as our fathers. Despite our efforts to use technology to clone a perfect human, it is impossible for us to exclude human emotions. This is why Mission Command has created a [b]Pesquisa Menu directive[/b] for this purpose. [b]Open the Pesquisa Menu[/b] to see the details. Completing [b]Pesquisa[/b] outlined on this menu will reward your Colony with production and/or construction blueprints. Your main objective is to create a self-sustainable colony, so naturally, you would want to research all available technologies for you. Objectives TAB in Pesquisa Menu contains objectives that your colonists can do. More Objectives you complete, the better chance of survival your colony will have and the more additional vessels you will be able to summon. As you progress further in the Pesquisa Árvore, you will have more technology, but you will also have more requirements to fulfill to satisfy both the União dos Clones and your Colonists. Inventing technology is not a straight line; while we could not come up with a solution to suppress greed, we know how to monitor Colonists with pinpoint accuracy and react to their needs. Commander, [b]locate any colonist and click the left mouse button to open their profile.[/b] The [b]section of the profile that I have highlighted is dedicated to the objectives[/b]. You must try to [b]complete as many as you can[/b] to [b]reach your influence goal[/b] and to [b]keep everyone happy[/b]. This [b]section is dedicated for the Colonist Inventory[/b]. This [b]section is dedicated for the status[/b]. By knowing their status, you can fulfill their needs. It has been pretty apparent from the very start that everyone is naked, but there are some statuses that you can only find out when you check this section. The skill grid is one of the most significant breakthroughs in human engineering. You can specialize colonists by using SKILL Capsules that you accumulate through your odyssey. This briefing should do, for now. I suspect there is a lot of information to process. Commander. I wish you success, and i will be contacting you later if necessary. At some point after Ragnorium, [b]humanity became very inefficient[/b], and [b]engineers had to come with a solution[/b] to stop degradation. The solution was to gamify human activities and to create a skill grid and LevelUp neural link. Visible improvement created motivation, and motivation created a productive society. [b]You are productive[/b]! Commander, one of your Colonists, has just experienced a meltdown! A meltdown happens when the happiness of one of your Colonists reaches zero. Some Colonists take meltdowns badly and can become full-fledged killers if they are not kept happy. But it depends on what modifier the Colonist has. Observe their profiles for more information. I have taken the liberty to populate your objective list with an additional objective that will yield you some happy pills once completed. Happy pills are useful as they keep colonists happy through a chemical process. Commander, it appears that one of your Colonists has an unfulfilled diet request. During the colonization efforts, Colonists will start demanding specialized food to remain happy and well-fed. Review your Colonist diet objectives and readjust production goals through a cooking table. Commander, I am happy to see that your construction efforts are coming to fruition. Something to keep in mind is that as your structures become complete, you will need to see what is inside. By clicking the [b]right mouse button[/b], you can hide the upper level of the structure when you [b]hover your mouse over the base/floor structure[/b]. If you want [b]to unhide, you press the middle mouse button[/b]. Just remember to keep an eye on the cutout/slice level of the structures and adjust them however you like it. Your wounded colonists heal while they are sleeping by a little amount. Make bandages via Homeopathy Table if you have that technology unlocked. Commander, it appears that your colony does not have any seeds that could be used in farming. [b]Try shaking a tree[/b], and you might get a seed. It's not a guaranteed, but it's worth the shot! Holy Android Android Battery This Battery powers this android Invasion : Holy Android Pesquisa Directive data is intercepted. Defeat Holy Android to resume receiving new technology. - Império Ark Android My makers have failed me; they used and abandoned me. Império Ark saved me and gave me a new purpose. I am a harbinger of justice, a Holy Android that is designed to purge all clones and bring peace to this world. Once i get rid of you, i will get rid of our makers, and i will restore the order that was once lost. Once i am finished with you and your colony, i will erase you from my memory so that i don't need to pollute my memory matrix with unnecessary calculations of rememembering you. It is the will of Ark Bishop; prepare yourself, Commander, you are finished. Commander! You are dealing with Holy Android, a retrofitted União dos Clones Android that is now doing Império Arks bidding. The information source is redacted, so i can't give all the details, but we are dealing with a dangerous machine. You can deal with regular Ark Soldiers with your current tech, but Holy Android wields a blaster, a ranged weapon, which will be problematic. You have two options Commander, 1) you research Chem Table and create a smokescreen portable equipment that reduces the hit chance of firearms, or 2) you go even further and produce gunpowder and create ranged weapons and fight with [b]flintlock rifles[/b]. Commander, choice is yours; good luck, i will be cheering in binary for your success. Holy Android has been destroyed. All Acolytes have been defeated, Commander, you did the impossible. An exceptional display of skill, Commander. Now that Acolytes are no longer the obstacle, not only your Colony can grow in peace but also other colonies as well. It's truly a remarkable event that is worth remembering. It's unclear how our main forces will deal with the Ark Bishop, but i believe you will not need to worry as this will be a matter that the União dos Clones will handle. Please continue with your mission, Commander; we will get back to you soon with a status update. Good luck!
